description.title: Designer and Developer
description.description: Hi, I am a front-end developer in React js. I am passionate about technology, sports, video games and learning new things.

description.part1: I currently live in Medellín, Colombia, where I study technology in web design and development at the Tecnológico de Antioquia (TdeA), my hobby has always been technology, which led me to learn programming from a very early age.
description.part2: I am a JavaScript development lover, my favorite development stack is MERN (Mongo, Express, React Js, NodeJS). Similarly, I like to experiment with new technologies such as TypeScript, Kotlin or Python.
